Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ……人の家で何してるの？ ガジュマなんかに入って 欲しくないんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing? I'd prefer that you don't bring those mangy Gajuma into my home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、あなた、 ガジュマを連れて来ないで。 気分が悪くなるわ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you, don't walk around with Gajuma so carelessly. You're making me feel sick!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もう！ ガジュマが 勝手に人の家に入らないで！
Entry.EnglishText: Please! Don't you carelessly bring those things into people's homes!
Entry.Notes: deepl says: ...... anymore! Gajuma don't go into people's houses without permission!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた……誰かに似てるわね？ どこかで見たような……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you... You look familiar. Coulda swore I've seen you before...

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスはいい街よ。 ガジュマもいないし、 気候もいいし……
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas is a pleasant town. There are no Gajuma around, and the weather is pleasant.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくしたら、 あなたたちも帰りたく なくなっちゃうかもね。
Entry.EnglishText: You might not be able to return any time soon.

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベ様のところに押しかけて、 話し合いを決めるなんて…… ガジュマって、図々しいわね！
Entry.EnglishText: How brazen of those Gajuma to suddenly barge in and demand Lord Scarabe's audience!

Entry.JapaneseText: 明日、話し合いがあるって事は、 ガジュマたちがこの地区に来る って事よね……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma seeking Lord Scarabe's audience are to arrive tomorrow,..

Entry.JapaneseText: 出かける時は、いつもより 戸締りを厳重にしなくちゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I have to tighten the doors securely tomorrow if I'm to go out...

Entry.JapaneseText: わ、私だって……以前は、 ガジュマと仲良くしてたわ…… でも、色々あったし……
Entry.EnglishText: E-Even I used to get along... with Gajuma... But a lot ended up happening...

Entry.JapaneseText: 向こうから連絡してくれば、 会ってもいいけど…… 自分からは……
Entry.EnglishText: It's fine if you were to approach them, but if it were me...
Entry.Notes: deepl says: If they contact me, I'm happy to meet with them, but I don't want to ...... myself.

Entry.JapaneseText: わ、私だって……以前は、 ガジュマと仲良くしてたわ…… でも、色々あったし……
Entry.EnglishText: E-Even I used to get along... with Gajuma... But a lot ended up happening...

Entry.JapaneseText: 向こうから連絡してくれば、 会ってもいいけど…… 自分からは……
Entry.EnglishText: It's fine if you were to approach them, but if it were me...

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様とジルバ様…… どっちの言う事が正しいの？
Entry.EnglishText: Princess Agarte or Lady Zilva... Which of them is right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちは、 どう思ってるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what the Gajuma think...?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうやったら以前のように スラムのガジュマと話したり できるのかしら。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if I could still speak to the Gajuma at the slums like I used to?

Entry.JapaneseText: なかなかきっかけが つかめなくって……
Entry.EnglishText: I just can't find the right timing...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなのかしらこの音…… 街の人もみんな、不安そうな 顔してる……
Entry.EnglishText: What's that sound? Everyone in town looks anxious...

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りがしたり、 空が変な色に変わったりして…… とっても不安だったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The sky and these earthquakes are worrying me...
Entry.Notes: deepl says: The earth rumbles, The sky turned a strange color. ...... I was very worried. ......

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの人たちとも話して 相談できたし、きっかけが できてよかったわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm glad I got the chance to speak with Gajuma again...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして私…… ガジュマ嫌いになったのかしら…… 昔は仲良くやってたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder how I ended up hating Gajuma...? I used to get along with them before...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『うずまく欲望』 人の中にある欲望の高まりを 黄金色のうずまきとして力強く 描き出した抽象画。 それほど古い作品ではない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Entangled Desires - An abstract painting that is vigorously crafted by a person with elevated desire. Its golden swirls over a pristine canvas indicate that its young age.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『愛の無限回路』 人の中にある果てなき愛のエナジーが 無限に巡る苦しみとよろこびを その形に描き出した抽象画。 わかる人にはわかる。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- The Infinite Cycle of Love - An abstract painting depicting the movement of love through an infinite cycle of happiness and anguish. If you know, you know.
